body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install fontconfig@2.12.3%gcc8.3.1 arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell
```

### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.16.1-2245-4cca69f4ed
* **Python:** 3.7.2
* **Platform:** linux-rhel7-broadwell
* **Concretizer:** clingo

### Additional information

This is a known issue with tarballs.  Refer to https://gitlab.freedesktop.org/fontconfig/fontconfig/-/issues/10 for more information about the work-around.

### General information

- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [ ] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: fontconfig 2.12.3
